Package ludo

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • ludo.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    The Game class is responsible for tha game logic. It can be initialized with 2 to 4 players. It contains 4 players, according to each color red, green, yellow and blue. Then, it contains the queue including the players actually playing in the game. And the board on which the players play the game.

      Initialize the game with the given number of players.
